item.title: First_post
item.author: sky
item.description: Hugo+Github Pages 把模版部署在网站上 hugo –theme=LoveIt –baseURL=“https://kezhenghui101.github.io/" -D 生成public文件夹，然后把文件夹push至GitHub cd public git init git add . git commit -m “first” git remote add origin git@github.com:kezhenghui101/kezhenghui101.github.io.git git push -u origin main ssh-keygen -t rsa -C “kezhenghui101@outlook.com”
